plot: A man assumes his date's "special" son is retarded. Actually, he is a 12-year-old genius. An intellectual battle ensues between the "brain" and the "blind from hell". At stake is the woman's virtue.
title: Special
plot_es: A man assumes his date's "special" son is retarded. Actually, he is a 12-year-old genius. An intellectual battle ensues between the "brain" and the "blind from hell". At stake is the woman's virtue.
